verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* towards \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w cast|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee: Whither \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*? thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Such|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w such|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w such|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w such|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w kinds|strong="H0929"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* tear, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fowls \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* air, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rage \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasses \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ezechias \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w have|strong="H2550"\w* \w pity|strong="H2550"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H4310"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*? \w or|strong="H2550"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* bemoan thee? \w or|strong="H2550"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w go|strong="H5493"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w pray|strong="H7592"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*?

Thou hast \w forsaken|strong="H5203"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thou art gone \w backward|strong="H0268"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* thee: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w weary|strong="H3811"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* entreating thee.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* fan \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* killed \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* form \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H1992"\w* \w widows|strong="H0490"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H6105"\w* unto \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w young|strong="H0970"\w* \w man|strong="H0970"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* spoiler \w at|strong="H5921"\w* noonday: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w terror|strong="H0928"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w sudden|strong="H0928"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w She|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w borne|strong="H3205"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H3205"\w* weak, \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* hath fainted \w away|strong="H0535"\w*: \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H0935"\w* \w down|strong="H5414"\w*, \w while|strong="H5750"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w*: \w she|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w confounded|strong="H2659"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* residue \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w me|strong="H3205"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*: \w why|strong="H3588"\w* hast thou \w borne|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w strife|strong="H7379"\w*, \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w contention|strong="H4066"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*? \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lent|strong="H5383"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* usury, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w lent|strong="H5383"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H3205"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* usury: \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* \w me|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* saith \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*: Assuredly \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* thy remnant, assuredly \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* help thee \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* affliction, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* tribulation against \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*.

Shall \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* be allied \w with|strong="H6828"\w* \w the|strong="H6828"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* from \w the|strong="H6828"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w and|strong="H5178"\w* \w the|strong="H6828"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*?

Thy \w riches|strong="H2428"\w* \w and|strong="H2428"\w* thy \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w spoil|strong="H0957"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*, \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w bring|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w which|strong="H0784"\w* thou knowest \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w kindled|strong="H6919"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* rage, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w burn|strong="H3344"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thou knowest, \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* defend \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* defend \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w patience|strong="H0750"\w*: \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w sake|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* sufferred \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.

Thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w assembly|strong="H5475"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* jesters, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* boast \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w alone|strong="H0910"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* threats.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3511"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H5331"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w wound|strong="H4347"\w* desperate \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w refuse|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*? \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* falsehood \w of|strong="H4325"\w* deceitful \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w trusted|strong="H0539"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w converted|strong="H7725"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* convert thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt separate \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* vile, thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* strong \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* mighty.
